definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: Neither Margaret nor Matthew has ever had a best friend.
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特和马修都没有最要好的朋友。

sentences.english: Marguerite, extremely pale and with her mouth half open, was trying to catch her breath.
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特的脸色苍白，嘴半张着，竭力想喘过气来。

sentences.english: There are no recollections in Grantham of Margaret with chums or boyfriends.
sentences.chinese: 在格兰哈姆，玛格丽特没有过男朋友。

sentences.english: Margaret and Gerard cast a scared look at one another.
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特和杰勒德彼此畏怯地望了一眼。

sentences.english: After that, Margaret and I headed to a Maori concert.
sentences.chinese: 之后，玛格丽特和我去听一场毛利音乐会。
但我想让玛格丽特帮我送回去。

sentences.english: It was through him that Margaret was able to meet leading people at the Bar.
sentences.chinese: 正是通过他，玛格丽特才能认识律师界的主要人物。

sentences.english: You let dear margaret stew in her own juice .
sentences.chinese: 你让亲爱的玛格丽特自作自受去吧。

sentences.english: She put the paper down and picked up the pen, but hesitated.
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特放下文件，拾起钢笔，却又踌躇了起来。

sentences.english: Margaret has little self-confidence; she curtseyed when we met.
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特缺乏自信，我们见面时，她行了屈膝礼。

sentences.english: 'Good evening, ' I replied, directing the greeting at both Marguerite and Prudence.
sentences.chinese: “晚安，”我向玛格丽特和普律当丝说。

sentences.english: Have a seat, Marguerite. Over there by the table.
sentences.chinese: 坐吧，玛格丽特，坐到何处桌子旁。

sentences.english: She picked up the waiver and scanned it.
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特拿起弃权声明书，扫视了一遍。

sentences.english: Mr. Thornton was a good deal more surprised and discomfited than she.
sentences.chinese: 宋腾先生反而大大吓了一跳，比玛格丽特尴尬多了。

sentences.english: One thing Margaret and I had in common was: we could do imitations.
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特和我的一个共同点是我们能够模仿。

definition: Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
